name: Bar Fight Finger Knife Agility: The drinking dangerous game - Free Edition
name_original: Bar Fight Finger Knife Agility: The drinking dangerous game - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR BAR FIGHT FINGER KNIFE AGILITY : THE DRINKING DANGEROUS GAME

Here we have another finger knife game for you. Start playing finger knife here with switchblade, Hunter and butterfly knife because you are in the bar this time.

Spread your fingers on pool table and or bar top and make weapons dancing between your fingers. But be careful and avoid crashing your finger to continue. This is the best game for your free time so download today and play for hour and hour.

Features:

- Amazing cartoon graphics and effects
- Cool soundtrack
- Easy to play but difficult to win
- Most addictive game

How to play?

- Spread your fingers and make knife dancing between your fingers
-Avoid crashing your finger


DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> BAR FIGHT FINGER KNIFE AGILITY : THE DRINKING DANGEROUS GAME
